name: Shinguru [ Early In Alpha Stage ]
description:
Shinguru is a game where you play as "Asuka" and need to find more answers about your parents house in Nagoro. Asuka lost connection with his parents for over 4 years now and decides to go back to the mantion to find answers about what happend. During the investigation you will face against the most mysterious creatures you will ever see in a game.

MUSIC USED:

"Kagome, Kagome" - HQ
